headquarters.name: Headquarters
headquarters.desc: The headquarters coordinate the development speed of your empire. The higher the level of the HQ and the faster the expansion of your Empire will be.
headquarters.feature: Reduce the upgrade time for buildings

training_facility.name: Training Facility
training_facility.desc: Here you can build units to attack your opponents. The time in which each unit will be completed will depend on the level of the facility.
training_facility.feature: Reduce the recruitment time for units

operation_center.name: Operation Center
operation_center.desc: This building increases the efficiency of your empire and permits you to get a bonus on all of your income.
operation_center.feature: +0.5% Income per Level (Does not work on the daily prize)

pantheon.name: Pantheon
pantheon.desc: The Pantheon does not have any particular function, but it shows a sign of wealth striking jealousy in your opponents.

research_center.name: Research Center
research_center.desc: The Research Center allows the training of your units in new techniques. As with the HQ, higher is the level, faster the skills are developed.
research_center.feature: Decrease the time required to learn new trainings

bunker.name: Bunker
bunker.desc: The Bunker permit you to keep safe a part of your units. The number of safe units is defined by their supply and the level of the bunker.
bunker.feature: Increase the size of the bunker by 1000 supply

strategic_center.name: Strategic Center
strategic_center.desc: The Strategic Center decrease the waiting time of jobs. The time in which each jobs will be reset will depend on the level of the strategic center.
strategic_center.feature: Decrease the time required to restart a job

grocery.name: Grocery
grocery.desc: No tattletale will see the upcoming Empire through the cracks. You can produce CASH without fear and at your own pace.

jewelry.name: Jewelry
jewelry.desc: Transform an abandoned building into a farm and produce more CASH while saving on water and energy.

car_dealer.name: Car Dealer
car_dealer.desc: This building is all White and it’s your way to honor the Crystal Meth King by producing more and more CASH at a comfortable speed.

nightclub.name: Nightclub
nightclub.desc: We call it 'LaCocina' or 'LaCuisine'. Add some salt, spices, sour, sugar to your CASH and it will be produced at a “Yes, Chef” speed.

casino.name: Casino
casino.desc: Produce CASH massively to take over the CrossWars.

money_safe.name: Money Safe
money_safe.desc: This building helps you to stock more CASH and keep them safe from enemies.

3dprint.name: 3D Printing
3dprint.desc: This is the Ammunition shop that you’ve stolen and transformed into a factory to start a small production of WEAPON.

gunsmith.name: Gunsmith
gunsmith.desc: No more only Ammunitions, it’s time to get to a bigger league by producing more WEAPON in your factory.

weapon_workshop.name: Weapon Workshop
weapon_workshop.desc: Start your weapon business by smuggling them all over the place and to produces more WEAPON.

pyrotechnic.name: Pyrotechnic Facility
pyrotechnic.desc: This market is a way for you to expand your business and to trade your stuff for even more WEAPON. Buyers and resellers can’t bargain with you.

industrial_factory.name: Industrial Factory
industrial_factory.desc: You are not like any other Drug Lords, you are always after new technology and you know this is the revolution to build WEAPON at a light speed in your backyard.

weapon_storage.name: Weapon Storage
weapon_storage.desc: This building helps you to stock more WEAPON and keep them safe from enemies.

t_distillery.name: Traditional Distillery
t_distillery.desc: This building is the start of your homemade ALCOHOL production

abbey.name: Abbey
abbey.desc: The best way to live in an addiction denial is to own a bar and to cut customer consumption with water to produce more ALCOHOL.

brewery.name: Brewery
brewery.desc: According to chemistry, ALCOHOL is a solution, then the Brewery is producing more solutions at a good pace.

castle.name: Castle
castle.desc: The Castle produces ALCOHOL by transforming grapes into wine.

industrial_distillery.name: Industrial Distillery
industrial_distillery.desc: The ultimate way to produce ALCOHOL that could fill your water fountain, your bathtub, your swimming pool and your pond in a blink of an eye.

alcohol_storage.name: Alcohol Silo
alcohol_storage.desc: This building helps you to stock more ALCOHOL and keep them safe from enemies.

camera.name: Cameras
camera.desc: The cameras help you to spy on your neighboors and catch any suspects move.

dogs.name: Dogs
dogs.feature: Powerfull against Melee units but can attack only once at the second round

troops.name: Defense Troops
troops.desc: A good defense which consist of having strong defenders.
troops.feature: Attack after the first round and never dies

emergency.name: Emergency
emergency.desc: The emergency can save some of your troops
emergency.feature: Revive a small percentage of your units

defense_system.name: Security System
defense_system.desc: This is a sophisticated system to defend yourself
defense_system.feature: Increased damage against ranged units, attack only at pair rounds (EG : 2-4-6)

hidden_mines.name: Hidden Mines
hidden_mines.desc: Put some mines around your base and suprise your opponents!
hidden_mines.feature: Splash damage triggered once at the first round (Each 5 level hit 3 enemies)

gang_hq.name: Gang Headquarters
gang_hq.desc: The gang headquarters coordinate the development speed of your gang. The higher the level of the Gang HQ and the faster the expansion of your gang will be.

embassy.name: Embassy
embassy.desc: This is the place where yours ambassadors and other representatives of the gang work. Much of the diplomacy between gangs happens there.

academy.name: Military Academy
academy.desc: The academy provide a military environment which cumulate with the training facility of your members.
academy.feature: Reduce the recruitment time for units

exchange.name: Crypto Exchange
exchange.desc: The exchange is the only building which is not available with resources and produce daily tokens for all your gang members. The tokens have to be claimed daily by the members if not they are lost.
exchange.feature: Produce 6 FUTURE (Total cost + 4.5%) tokens per members and last 90 days

scientific_lab.name: Scientific Lab
scientific_lab.desc: Reliable and efficient, the program focuses on testing and creating new cash.
scientific_lab.feature: Each level increase the CASH production of all your gang members by 0.25%

weapon_center.name: Weapon Development Center
weapon_center.feature: Each level increase the weapon production of all your gang members by 0.5%

distillery_school.name: Distillery School
distillery_school.desc: Milling, mashing, distilling, bottling and labelling won't have any more secret for your gang members.
distillery_school.feature: Each level increase the alcohol production of your gang members by 0.5%
